metadata.name: Hierophant
metadata.description:
The Hierophant is one who unites the sacred with the secular; one who provides a passageway so that others may see the divine.

An interpreter that can grasp the Heavenly concepts and bring them down to Earth.

Wire-wrapping has long been thought to be a physical-only realm,   that it would take a computer a long time to replicate.

Thankfully, due to modern advancements, results are much faster and more beautiful than ever before.

With these upgrades, the coil-conscious mind will finally be visualized!

Witness the reveal of the world's first  
fully 3D wire-wrapped hybrid pendant!

Featuring:  
Concave Fantasy-cut Peridot  
+  
Green Tourmaline Crystal  
+  
x4 Faceted Peridot  
+  
Set in 3D Wire and Fabricated Elements


This pendant is entirely digital, and has never been made in physical form....yet...

Jolted 2022
